snippet: Pain is on the way for the next mayor, despite Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s proposal for a balanced budget.
abstract: Editorial warns New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio that the budget challenges he faces are real and immense for both the short and long term; expresses skepticism about Mayor Michael Bloomberg's balanced budget for the fiscal year; contends it is up to de Blasio to show the public how he will make the numbers work.
lead_paragraph: Pain is on the way for the next mayor, despite Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s proposal for a balanced budget.
